Property.title: Property
Property.description: Represents a real estate property listed on the Vía Hogar portal.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Property entity.

name.description: Name or title of the property.

mainImageUrl.description: URL or reference to the main image of the property.

PageSection.title: PageSection
PageSection.description: Represents a modular section of a property detail page, dynamically assembled by the administrator.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PageSection entity.

type.description: Type of the section (e.g., HeroSection, GallerySection, LocationSection).

style.description: Styling information for the section (e.g., background color).

sectionData.description: Holds the id to one of the specific Section Data entities (e.g. HeroSectionData, GallerySectionData)

ContactSubmission.title: ContactSubmission
ContactSubmission.description: Represents a contact form submission from a user interested in a property.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ContactSubmission entity.

name.description: Name of the person submitting the contact form.

phone.description: Phone number of the person submitting the contact form.

interestedIn.description: Whether the user is a buyer or broker.

HeroSectionData.title: HeroSectionData
HeroSectionData.description: Data specific to a Hero Section, including the background image and draggable text.

id.description: Unique identifier for the HeroSectionData entity.

backgroundImageUrl.description: URL or reference to the background image.

title.description: Main title text for the hero section.

DraggableTextData.title: DraggableTextData
DraggableTextData.description: Data for a draggable text element, including its text content, style, and position.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DraggableTextData entity.

text.description: Text content of the draggable element.

positionX.description: X coordinate of the text's position.

positionY.description: Y coordinate of the text's position.

ImageWithFeaturesSectionData.title: ImageWithFeaturesSectionData
ImageWithFeaturesSectionData.description: Data for the Image with Features section, including a media object and a list of features.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ImageWithFeaturesSectionData entity.

mediaUrl.description: URL or reference to the image or video.

Feature.title: Feature
Feature.description: Represents a single feature within the Image with Features section.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Feature entity.

imageUrl.description: URL or reference to the image for the feature.

subtitle.description: Subtitle or description of the feature.

GallerySectionData.title: GallerySectionData
GallerySectionData.description: Data for the Gallery Section, containing a list of image URLs.

id.description: Unique identifier for the GallerySectionData entity.

imageUrls.description: URLs or references to the images in the gallery.

LocationSectionData.title: LocationSectionData
LocationSectionData.description: Data for the Location Section, including coordinates and nearby places.

id.description: Unique identifier for the LocationSectionData entity.

NearbyPlace.title: NearbyPlace
NearbyPlace.description: Represents a nearby place of interest for the Location Section.

id.description: Unique identifier for the NearbyPlace entity.

icon.description: Icon associated with the nearby place.

imageUrl.description: Optional image for the nearby place.

AmenitiesSectionData.title: AmenitiesSectionData
AmenitiesSectionData.description: Data for the Amenities Section, containing a list of amenities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AmenitiesSectionData entity.

Amenity.title: Amenity
Amenity.description: Represents a single amenity for the Amenities Section.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Amenity entity.

PricingSectionData.title: PricingSectionData
PricingSectionData.description: Data for the Pricing Section, containing a list of tiers.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PricingSectionData entity.

Tier.title: Tier
Tier.description: Represents a single pricing tier for the Pricing Section.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Tier entity.

name.description: Name of the tier (e.g., Basic, Premium).

isFeatured.description: Indicates whether the tier is featured.

FeatureTier.title: FeatureTier
FeatureTier.description: Represents a single feature within a pricing tier.

id.description: Unique identifier for the FeatureTier entity.

ContactSectionData.title: ContactSectionData
ContactSectionData.description: Data for the Contact Section, similar to HeroSectionData.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ContactSectionData entity.

backgroundImageUrl.description: URL or reference to the background image.

title.description: Main title text for the contact section.

subtitle.description: Subtitle text for the contact section.

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore structure is designed to optimize for security, scalability, and ease of querying, particularly focusing on the dynamic and modular nature of the 'Vía Hogar' application's property details pages. The key strategy is to separate concerns into different collections, avoiding complex authorization rules and ensuring that list operations are always secure.

Authorization Independence is achieved through a path-based ownership model for properties and contact submissions, as well as separate data entities for sections and their data. There is no reliance on `get()` calls in security rules. The structure is tailored to the application's content management system (CMS) features, supporting dynamic page building and in-place editing. The use of localStorage is handled at the application level and does not affect the database structure.

The structure supports QAPs by avoiding the need for filtering in rules; list operations are secure by default because each collection contains only documents that should be accessible under specific conditions. For instance, contact submissions are nested under property documents, ensuring that only authorized users can access submissions related to a specific property.
